title: Configuring Cascading Select
description: One can drive the content of a Select widget based upon the selection of another Select widget. For example, a user is provided with a list of Countries and based upon the selection, a list of Cities is displayed for selection from a second list. Let us see how to achieve this in WaveMaker. Note: We are using a dataset CityListing which contains the country and city details.
